title: Introduction to AI Agents - Quiz
description: Test your understanding of AI agent fundamentals

options: A software program that follows predetermined rules
A software program that can perceive its environment, make decisions, and take actions to achieve specific goals
answer_config.correct: A software program that can perceive its environment, make decisions, and take actions to achieve specific goals
answer_config.explanation: AI agents are autonomous programs that perceive their environment, make intelligent decisions, and take actions to achieve goals, unlike traditional software that only follows preset rules.

questions.question_text: True or False: AI agents can only react to current input and have no memory.

answer_config.explanation: False. While simple reflex agents may lack memory, most modern AI agents maintain context and history to provide better responses.

questions.question_text: Which characteristic allows AI agents to take initiative and anticipate user needs?

answer_config.explanation: Pro-activeness allows agents to take initiative, anticipate needs, and suggest improvements rather than just reacting to input.

questions.question_text: What are the core components of modern AI agents? (Name at least one)

answer_config.explanation: Modern AI agents are built on LLMs for intelligence, tools/APIs for actions, memory systems for context, and planning/reasoning for complex tasks.

questions.question_text: Which type of AI agent maintains internal state and tracks conversation history?

answer_config.explanation: Model-Based Agents maintain internal state and memory of past interactions, unlike Simple Reflex Agents which only respond to current input.

questions.question_text: True or False: AI agents are used only in customer service applications.

answer_config.explanation: False. AI agents are used across many industries including healthcare, e-commerce, education, finance, and software development.

questions.question_text: What does 'Natural Language Processing' enable AI agents to do?

correct: understand and respond to natural language
answer_config.explanation: NLP (Natural Language Processing) enables agents to understand and respond to human language, making interactions more natural and intuitive.

questions.question_text: In the agent architecture diagram, which layer is responsible for API calls and tool usage?

answer_config.explanation: The Action Layer is responsible for executing actions through API calls, tool usage, and interactions with external systems.

questions.question_text: True or False: Learning Agents can improve their performance over time.

answer_config.explanation: True. Learning Agents adapt and improve their performance based on experience and user feedback.

questions.question_text: What is one advantage AI agents offer over traditional applications?

answer_config.explanation: AI agents offer several advantages including natural language interaction, contextual understanding, intelligent automation, adaptive learning, and continuous availability.
